item.description:
I am second year PhD student at University of Groningen (The Netherlands) under the supervision of Dr. Jorge A. PÃ©rez and Prof. Gerard Renardel de Lavalette. My research work concerns tools for rigorous software development, in particular techniques for certifying correct and reliable communication-intensive software.

Prior to this, I developed Master thesis on the modular type inference algorithm for ML-like programming languages in Haskell supervised by Prof. Silvia Ghilezan at the Faculty of Technical Sciences (Novi Sad, Serbia).
